sn23.35-45:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ rādhaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn23.35-45:1.3: “yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo.
sn23.35-45:1.5: Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo … pe …
sn23.35-45:1.6: viññāṇaṃ māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo … pe …
sn23.35-45:1.7: yo kho, rādha, māro; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo”ti.
sn23.35-45:2.1: “Yo kho, rādha, māradhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo … pe …. (2)
sn23.35-45:11.1: “Yo kho, rādha, samudayadhammo; tatra te chando pahātabbo, rāgo pahātabbo, chandarāgo pahātabbo … pe …. (11)
